channel.title: CoreX - The Core of Servers (UPADTED)
channel.description:
[center]CoreX is a Project being Developed by me and [b]only[/b] me, others once needed.
It bases off Impact V1.0 orginally released by Mr.Impact and progressed into something different by X Entinity X, i'm going to be useing X Entinity X's version as it has basic implemented skills, decent combat and networking.[/center]
[center]All the none-combat skills have been re-written to perfection by [b]me[/b] and [b]only[/b] me, they use good proccessors to keep it effcient. I'm currently now working on re-writting the combat to near perfection.[/center]
[center][b][u]Features;[/u][/b]
[ul][li]474 Mapdata dumped[/li] [li]474 ItemData dumped[/li] [li]New interfaces[/li] [li]Vps hosted[/li] [li]Webclient Playable[/li] [li]MySQL now flowing for Highscores.[/li] [li]Basic NPC's[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center]Complete Progression Yet to complete
[ul][li]Clan Chat[/li] [li]Networking[/li] [li]Stablization[/li] [li]None-combat skills[/li] [li]Quests (2)[/li] [li]Clipped NPC'S[/li] [li]Following (soon to be clipped)[/li] [li]474 Data[/li] [li]Combat - re-done[/li] [li]Godwars[/li] [li]Castle Wars[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center]Thieveing is now processed and handled as int stallData[][] = { // stall, lvl, xp, gold, stall intensity[/center]
[center][u][b]Media[/b][/u][/center]
[center] [URL=http://img843.imageshack.us/i/agilityv.png/][IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/2520/agilityv.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img692.imageshack.us/i/clanchat.png/][IMG]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/2614/clanchat.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img593.imageshack.us/i/clipped.png/][IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/7991/clipped.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img407.imageshack.us/i/homest.png/][IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/637/homest.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img253.imageshack.us/i/lololc.png/][IMG]http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/4792/lololc.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img715.imageshack.us/i/tabj.png/][IMG]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/3900/tabj.png[/img][/URL][/center]
More information and media coming soon.
We like to do things professionaly, and were looking for people to help Develop this Server, so if your interested and up to the standards, then feel free to PM me.
[b]I'd like to thank;[/b]
Mr.Impact (Orginal V1 base) X Entinity X (The build off the base) Core (474 Data)

item.title: CoreX - The Core of Servers (UPADTED)
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

It’s handled through actionhandler.java;

case 4875: Thieving.thieveStall(c, objectType); break;

It’s used like this to keep the file clean and effcient. Other Project Insanity’s would process this differently and the prices would normally be handled in here as well.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

Thanks, because in Version 2.0 nearly everything is perfected and complete where as ChronicleX there’s quite alot of things to do from re-writing the Skills to implementing basic Minigames.

@Int_Bauk wrote:

[center]CoreX is a Project being Developed by me and only me, others once needed.

It bases off Impact V1.0 orginally released by Mr.Impact and progressed into something different by X Entinity X, i’m going to be useing X Entinity X’s version as it has basic implemented skills, decent combat and networking.[/center]

[center]All the none-combat skills have been re-written to perfection by me and only me, they use good proccessors to keep it effcient.
I’m currently now working on re-writting the combat to near perfection.[/center]

Progression

More information and media coming soon.

We like to do things professionaly, and were looking for people to help Develop this Server, so if your interested and up to the standards, then feel free to PM me.
